summary.name: Kenneth Cole Reaction Charcoal Basketweave Slim-Fit Suit
summary.description: Stand out and make a statement with this charcoal slim-fit suit from Kenneth Cole Reaction.
bullets: Kenneth Cole Reaction men's slim-fit suit
Jacket: notched lapel, two-button closure, four-button cuffs, left chest pocket, front flap pockets, side vents, fully lined
Pants: flat front, zip fly with double-hook closure, front slant pockets, back button-through welt pockets, partially lined to the knee
Pants have an unfinished hem so you can tailor them to your exact measurements; 7" drop (Subtract 7 inches from your jacket size to determine your pant waist size) Sizes 46 and 48 have a 6"drop
Approximate measurements (Rise: 9 5/8", Leg Opening: 17 1/8" , Inseam: 37") All based off a 42R Suit
Cut with a narrower point-to-point shoulder measurement
Higher armhole and trimmer through the chest and waist
Slim trousers with a tapered leg

notes: You can return this item to any Macy's store

values.value: Stand out and make a statement with this charcoal slim-fit suit from Kenneth Cole Reaction.
You can return this item to any Macy's store

Reviews.productName: Kenneth Cole Reaction Charcoal Basketweave Slim-Fit Suit
Reviews.description: Stand out and make a statement with this charcoal slim-fit suit from Kenneth Cole Reaction.

perReviewWrapper.reviewDesc: Fits nice, very stylish, receive lots of complements on this suit.

I was in a conference in Miami FL and one of the speakers was wearing a suit similar to this one, it looked so sharp. I came back and started looking for something similar, I found this one and I could not be happier with it. No one knows how much you pay for your suit if you wear them and you make them look expensive...lol!
My son enjoyed it tremendously! Comfortable fit and material.
Bought this slim fit suit but it's more like classic fit. too baggy overall
however had to return because other suit was better fit with my needs might be next time

This is a very sharp looking suit. The fabric has a little shine to it. I usually wear a 44R and since this is a slim fit suit, the arm holes are a little too tight causing the shoulders to divot. I had to exchange it for a 46R and get it tailored. But I am very happy with the look.
ABSOLUTELY LOVED THIS SUIT, AND FOR THE PRICE WAS UNBELIEVABLE, WORE IT TO A WEDDING AND GOT COMMENTS ABOUT HOW I LOOKED BETTER THAN THE GROOM!

I bought this suit for my son for Prom. He's a tall, slim kid so I was happy to be able to purchase a slim-fit suit, it fits him great. We are getting the pants altered a little in the waist and in the length. I personally thought it was a bit too shiny but my 18 yr old son really likes it and feels very slick in it so if he's happy, I'm happy. I also bought the Van Heusen X Slim Non-Iron Poplin Dress Shirt to go with it so both of these slim fit items work great for my slim kid. Also the Alfani Ascher Bike-Toe slip on shoes. The boy looks GOOD!
Fits really well. Love the color and the fit. I would recommend it!
amazing suit for a more amazing price! love the fit.

summary.name: MICHAEL Michael Kors Damita Platform Wedge Sandals
summary.description: The height of fashion... the Damita platform sandals are the ultimate summer wedge. The heel is the perfect height and the lightweight fabric comes in super cute colors. The zipper detail along the front provides the chic and glamorous touch that MICHAEL Kors is known for.
bullets: Round open-toe platform wedge sandals with zipper closure on front
3-3/4" espadrille wedge heel, 1" platform, feels like 2-3/4" heel

notes: You can return this item to any Macy's store.

values.value: The height of fashion... the Damita platform sandals are the ultimate summer wedge. The heel is the perfect height and the lightweight fabric comes in super cute colors. The zipper detail along the front provides the chic and glamorous touch that MICHAEL Kors is known for.
You can return this item to any Macy's store.

Reviews.productName: MICHAEL Michael Kors Damita Platform Wedge Sandals
Reviews.description: The height of fashion... the Damita platform sandals are the ultimate summer wedge. The heel is the perfect height and the lightweight fabric comes in super cute colors. The zipper detail along the front provides the chic and glamorous touch that MICHAEL Kors is known for.

perReviewWrapper.reviewDesc: Fell in love the moment I saw them online. They are not just beautiful but comfortable too. Definitely recommend
If you have VERY narrow feet, you will be able to get your foot in.  If not, don't buy.  They are really cute though.
I love my wedge's. the are very comfortable to walk in. I had to send them back due needing a bigger size. They are great!!!

Have these in Navy, they are the most comfortable shoes and look great with many different summer outfits! Receive so many compliments when I wear them. Also, they are versatile, I wear them a lot and they haven't started to get worn out or dirty. Wore them to a pool club and even after getting a little wet they still look great.
VERY pleased with this product.  Comfy, true to size and fast shipping!
Love them so much that I ordered them in brown too.  Very comfortable and got lots of compliments.
You have made one of the most beautiful, comfortable, awesome shoe that I want every color!!! They are so fantastic and sexy that I purchased four pair!!! I want them alllllll!!!!
I just bought these wedges and they fit perfect! They keep your feet in place and are super super cute!!!! Can wear with anything! Highly recommend!!

perReviewWrapper.reviewTitle: Great shoe but I have fat feet
perReviewWrapper.reviewDesc: I order this online in my usual size, but the zipper barely made it over my foot. I will see if I can exchange it for a larger size or if they have it in a wide because I think the shoe is suitable for people who can wear regular/medium width.
Got them in Navy. Beautiful and very comfortable!!
